About Kids App

Kids App is a One-Stop location for all Activities and Educational material for all kids. the App will give an opportunity for parents to search for Activities based on categories, locations, ages, and more. Kids App mission is to make it easier for parents to experience all kids activities around the world.

All Activities on Kids App are provided through the registered providers network, all providers are registered with submitting the required Documents and Certificates.

What Kids App Offer

  • Incredible Selection

    Weather you are searching for educational activities, sport, or even camping. Kids App gives you amazing diversity and variety of choice – all in one place.

  • Instant Confirmation

    At Kids App, every reservation is instantly confirmed. When you find your perfect activity, a few clicks are all it takes.

  • No Reservation Fees

    We don’t charge you any booking fees or add any administrative charges. And in many cases, your booking can be canceled free of charge.

  • Secure Booking

    We are handling all transactions through our secure platform and work to the highest standards to guarantee your privacy.

  • 24/7 Support

    Our professional registed Providers are available around the clock to answer your questions and advocate on your behalf
